Knowz.API.description: Regenerate the comprehensive AI summary from content and attachments
Trigger full AI re-enrichment including extraction, summarization, chunking, entity extraction, and indexing

Knowz.API.description: Get Azure Speech Service authorization token for real-time transcription

Knowz.API.summary: Query knowledge base with enhanced expansion
Knowz.API.description: Uses intelligent query expansion with synonyms and related terms
Parallel knowledge fetch with 6 search strategies + single LLM synthesis

Knowz.API.summary: Execute an enhanced query with linear or agentic mode
Knowz.API.description: Supports both single-pass linear queries and multi-iteration agentic reasoning
Analyzes entire project structure, identifies patterns, and provides deep insights

Public Sites.description: Returns the public configuration of a published customer site based on the subdomain in the Host header. Only published sites are accessible.
Start a chunked file upload session for a public site. Returns upload session ID and chunk configuration.
Upload a single chunk of file data. Include X-Chunk-Index header (0-based).
Finalize the chunked upload and create the file record. Returns the FileRecordId to use in submission.
Check the progress of an ongoing file upload.
Cancel an ongoing file upload and clean up resources.
Returns the public configuration of a published customer site by its slug. Only published sites are accessible.
Submit content anonymously to a published customer site. May require email verification depending on site configuration.
Start the verification process for gated form flow. Sends OTP code to email or phone. Returns submission ID for verification step.
Verify a submission using the 6-digit OTP code sent to the submitter's email. Code expires after the configured timeout.
Request a new verification code for a submission. The previous code will be invalidated.
Check the status of a submission. Returns whether verification is still required or if the submission has been processed.

SuperAdminIndexes.summary: Get index status for all tenants.
Reindex all knowledge for a specific tenant.
Reindex all knowledge for all tenants.
Clear dead-letter queue messages by resubmitting them.
Get thumbnail processing status for a tenant.
Regenerate thumbnails for files missing them in a tenant.
Get detailed index information for a specific tenant including vaults.
Reindex a specific vault within a tenant.

Get recent pipeline processing jobs across all tenants.
Shows knowledge items and their processing status through the pipeline.
Get processing details for a specific knowledge item.
Retry processing for a failed knowledge item.

Background Jobs.summary: Get active jobs for current tenant
Get job statistics for current tenant

Inbox.description: Captures a quick inbox entry scoped to the authenticated tenant.

Inbox.summary: List inbox items for the current tenant
Inbox.description: Returns a paged list of inbox items filtered by status and search criteria.
Retrieves the full details of a single inbox item by its GUID.
Updates the status of an inbox item. Enforces state machine: Unspecified  Processing  Processed  Archived.
Soft-deletes an inbox item by marking it as deleted.

Inbox.summary: Convert inbox item to knowledge item
Inbox.description: Converts a single inbox item to a knowledge item in the specified vault.

Inbox.summary: Batch convert inbox items to knowledge items
Inbox.description: Converts multiple inbox items to knowledge items in a single operation. Supports up to 100 items.

Inbox.summary: List attachments for an inbox item
Inbox.description: Returns all file attachments associated with an inbox item, including SAS URLs for blob and thumbnail access.

Inbox.summary: Create file attachment for inbox item
Inbox.description: Links an uploaded file to an inbox item by creating a FileAttachmentjunction record.
Downloads a file attachment associated with an inbox item.

Inbox.summary: Convert inbox item by merging with existing knowledge
Inbox.description: Converts an inbox item by merging its content with an existing knowledge item using the specified strategy.

Files.description: Intelligently routes file queries to either database listing or semantic search

Files.summary: List all files with a specific extension
Upload a file to a vault
Generate a temporary download URL for a file

Perspective.summary: Get all perspective definitions for the tenant
Get active perspective definitions for the tenant
Generate perspectives for a knowledge item
Get perspectives for a knowledge item
Batch generate perspectives for multiple knowledge items

Customer Sites.description: Returns paginated list of customer sites for the current tenant with optional filtering.
Creates a new customer site with the specified slug. Site starts unpublished.
Returns a specific customer site by its ID. Site must belong to current tenant.
Updates an existing customer site. Only provided fields are updated.
Soft deletes a customer site. The site will no longer be accessible.
Makes the site publicly accessible. Site must have valid configuration.
Makes the site no longer publicly accessible.
Checks if a slug is available for use. Returns validation errors if slug format is invalid.

Personas.summary: Clone a persona with a new name

Site Submissions.description: Returns paginated list of site submissions for the current tenant with optional filtering.
Returns a specific submission by its ID. Submission must belong to current tenant.
Soft deletes a submission. The submission can no longer be accessed after deletion.
Approves a submission and converts it to an InboxItem or Knowledge based on site settings.
Rejects a submission with an optional reason. Rejected submissions are not converted.
Approves multiple submissions in a single request. Returns detailed results per submission.
Rejects multiple submissions in a single request. Returns detailed results per submission.
Deletes multiple submissions in a single request. Returns detailed results per submission.

Hard delete a tenant with complete cleanup (super admin only).

WARNING: This is permanent and irreversible. All tenant data will be completely deleted.

AiPrompts.summary:
Get all AI prompts for the current tenant.
Returns system defaults merged with any tenant-specific customizations.
Get a specific AI prompt by key
Update or create a tenant-specific AI prompt override
Reset a prompt to system default (delete tenant customization)

Execute a prompt with the AI model and return the actual response.

Data Management.description: Initiates an asynchronous export of tenant data (vaults, knowledge, entities) to JSON format. Returns a job ID for tracking progress.
Retrieves the current status of an export job. When status is 'complete', includes a download URL for the exported JSON file (valid for 1 hour).

Data Management.summary: Download complete data takeout as ZIP
Data Management.description: Generates and downloads a ZIP file containing all tenant data (JSON export + README). This is a synchronous operation - for large datasets, consider using the async export endpoint instead.
Validates import JSON without modifying the database. Returns errors, warnings, and conflict detection results. Users should review conflicts before proceeding to actual import.
Initiates an asynchronous import of data from JSON format. Applies conflict resolution strategy (skip, overwrite, merge, rename). Returns a job ID for tracking progress.
Retrieves the current status of an import job. When status is 'complete', includes a summary with counts of created/skipped items.

Graph.summary: Get related knowledge with depth (2-5 hops using recursive CTE).

Federated Identity.summary: Login with email and password (federated identity)

Returns available tenants for the identity. If only one tenant is available,
a JWT token is automatically generated. For multiple tenants, use the
select-tenant endpoint to get a token for a specific tenant.

Federated Identity.summary: Select a tenant and get a JWT token
Federated Identity.description:
Use this after login when multiple tenants are available and no token was returned.
Also updates the last-accessed tenant for this identity.

Use this to switch tenants within an authenticated session.
The identity is extracted from the current JWT token.
